mapper.insert:
insert into t_alipay_trade_details (channelorderno, payorderid, bustype, subject, ordercreatetime, orderendtime, storeno, storename, operatorname, device, accountnofrom, orderamount, amount, alipayredenvelope, jifenbao, alipaydiscount, discountamount, juanhexiao, juan, redenvelopecons, cardconsamount, refundbatchno, servicecharge, profit, tradedate, areacode, batchno, hospitalid, hospitalname, remark, createtime, updatetime) values
( #{detail.channelorderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.payorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.bustype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.ordercreatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.orderendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.storeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.storename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.operatorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.device,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.accountnofrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.orderamount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detail.amount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detail.alipayredenvelope,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detail.jifenbao,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detail.alipaydiscount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detail.discountamount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detail.juanhexiao,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detail.juan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.redenvelopecons,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.cardconsamount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detail.refundbatchno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.servicecharge,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detail.profit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{detail.tradedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.areacode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail.batchno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.hospitalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.hospitalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{detail.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
